alfredsnippet.snippet:
"We must always remember that Nature does not have the guile to create fictions and paradoxes. Only we poor humans have the ability to deceive ourselves in that way."

- N. Vivian Pope, Breaking The Light-Barrier to Scientific Progress, A paper read to the PIRT (Physical Interpretations of Relativity Theory) Conference, at Imperial College, London, September 11th 2006
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Paradoxes Are Human Creations
